qrbsgen package

Submodules

qrbsgen.qrbs module

class qrbsgen.qrbs.QuantumRuleBasedSystem(operators=None)[source]

Bases: object

Creates a new quantum rule-based system.

add_rules(rules)[source]

Adds new rules to the quantum rule-based system. :param rules: list of rules to be added to QRBS. Rules must be specified as strings, with defined syntax.

evaluate_rules(rule_terms, qubits)[source]

Evaluates rules using quantum rule-based system. :param rule_terms: terms that make up the rules to be translated to the quantum circuit. :param qubits: nummber of qubits to add to quantum register in the quantum circuit.
